HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Free for orders over 1,500 Kč, 85 Kč for orders up to 1,500 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: PPL usually delivers packages within 24 hours of handing over the shipment. Deliveries take place on working days from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Bikes and skis can only be delivered to INTERSPORT stores for pickup.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Free for orders over 1,500 Kč, 55 Kč for orders up to 1,500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Free for orders over 1,500 Kč, 55 Kč for orders up to 1,500 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Any INTERSPORT store in the Czech Republic.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Intersport.cz provides home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: The primary carrier is PPL for both home and pickup point deliveries, with AlzaBox as a partner for parcel lockers. PRICING: Home delivery costs 85 Kč, and parcel point delivery costs 55 Kč. Free shipping is offered on all orders over 1,500 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. RESTRICTIONS: Shipping is only available within the Czech Republic. Bulky items like bicycles and skis cannot be delivered to a home address and must be picked up at an Intersport store. NOTABLE FEATURES: In-store pickup for bikes and skis is free and includes initial setup and service. PPL drivers are equipped with payment terminals, allowing for card payment upon delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a single, well-organized page. It clearly outlines the available methods, providers, and costs. However, it lacks specific details regarding COD surcharges, express options, and weekend delivery capabilities.
